snippet.title: Too Spicy - Arcade Gameplay
snippet.description:
Arcade lightgun shooter from Sega that runs on the Lindbergh hardware. This Video shows in-game footage. The premise of the game is built around a head-to-head classic gun fight. Normally sold as 2 cabinets for head to head play but can be played solo in story mode.

for more information please visit
http://www.highwaygames.com/products/view.php?id=3256
